__e: Gibbs? Look, I know that Special Agent Macy's murder is super important, and I know that you guys have a long history together going back to when you were a marine.
I just got off the phone with Amy, Special Agent James Nelson's bride of two months.
And I am more than happy to do whatever the Agency requires of me, but I resent having a rude message left on my phone by Special Agent Gibbs.
